name: Avocado Toast
description: with sea salt and lemon juice, served on toasted artisan bread.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: With Canadian bacon on a toasted English muffin, topped with hollandaise sauce.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and a choice of fresh berries or bananas.

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of bread soaked in a mixture of beaten eggs and milk, grilled until golden brown.

description: Three-egg omelette filled with saut√©ed spinach, mushrooms, tomatoes, and Swiss cheese.

name: Fruit Salad
description: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits, such as strawberries, blueberries, kiwi, and melon.

name: Granola Bowl
description: Greek yogurt topped with house-made granola, honey, and a selection of fresh fruits and nuts.
